3597020.headline: Altria reaffirms 2017 adj EPS guidance
3597020.description: May 18 (Reuters) - Altria Group Inc <MO.N>:Altria group inc says  declares regular quarterly dividend of $0.61 per share.Altria group inc - reaffirmed altria's guidance for 2017 full-year adjusted diluted earnings per share.Fy2017 earnings per share view $3.28 -- Thomson Reuters I\/B\/E\/S.

3892512.description: Altria Group Inc <MO.N>::ALTRIA INCREASES QUARTERLY DIVIDEND BY 14.3% TO $0.80 PER COMMON SHARE.

3952598.description: Dec 12 (Reuters) - Altria Group Inc <MO.N>::ALTRIA DECLARES REGULAR QUARTERLY DIVIDEND OF $0.80 PER COMMON SHARE.

3991602.headline: Altria Declares Regular Quarterly Dividend Of $0.80 Per Common Share
3991602.description: Feb 28 (Reuters) - Altria Group Inc <MO.N>::ALTRIA DECLARES REGULAR QUARTERLY DIVIDEND OF $0.80 PER COMMON SHARE.

4085378.headline: Altria Reaches Fifty-Year Dividend Increase Milestone
4085378.description: Altria Group Inc <MO.N>::ALTRIA REACHES FIFTY-YEAR DIVIDEND INCREASE MILESTONE.ALTRIA GROUP INC - APPROVED A DIVIDEND INCREASE TO $0.84 PER COMMON SHARE.ALTRIA GROUP INC - NEW ANNUALIZED DIVIDEND RATE IS $3.36 PER COMMON SHARE.

4088200.headline: Fitch Says Tobacco Concentration Lingers with Proposed Altria-Philip Morris Merger
4088200.description: Aug 28 (Reuters) - Fitch::FITCH SAYS RECENTLY CONFIRMED DISCUSSIONS OF POTENTIAL MERGER BETWEEN ALTRIA-PHILIP MORRIS INTERNATIONAL CONTINUE TOBACCO SECTOR CONSOLIDATION TRENDS.FITCH SAYS RECENTLY CONFIRMED DISCUSSIONS OF POTENTIAL MERGER BETWEEN ALTRIA-PHILIP MORRIS HIGHLIGHTS SHIFTED FOCUS AWAY FROM TOBACCO LITIGATION RISKS.FITCH SAYS PROPOSED ALTRIA-PMI TRANSACTION ALSO EXPOSES PMI TO GREATER REGULATORY UNCERTAINTY SURROUNDING FLAVOURED E-CIGARETTE MARKET.

4117802.headline: Altria CEO Says Projecting Lower E-Cig Volumes In U.S. Than Prior Estimates
4117802.description: Oct 31 (Reuters) - Altria Group Inc <MO.N>::ALTRIA GROUP CEO SAYS BELIEVES RAISING LEGAL AGE TO BUY TOBACCO PRODUCTS TO 21 IS THE MOST EFFECTIVE ACTION TO REVERSE RISE IN TEEN VAPING: CONF. CALL.ALTRIA GROUP CEO SAYS PROJECTING LOWER E-CIG VOLUMES IN THE U.S. THAN PREVIOUSLY ESTIMATED.ALTRIA GROUP FORECASTS LONG-TERM COMPOUNDED ANNUAL ADJUSTED DILUTED EPS GROWTH OF 5% - 8% FROM 7%- 9% FOR THE YEARS 2020 THROUGH 2022.ALTRIA GROUP CEO SAYS PLEASED WITH RECENT DECISIONS BY JUUL TO CHANGE LEADERSHIP.ALTRIA GROUP CEO SAYS THERE IS A POSSIBILITY THE VAPING CATEGORY COULD SEE ITS GROWTH RATE SLOW DOWN OR SEE IT FLAT IN RELATION TO FDA GUIDANCE.ALTRIA GROUP CEO SAYS DID NOT ANTICIPATE THIS DRAMATIC A CHANGE IN THE E-VAPOR CATEGORY WHEN CO MADE INVESTMENT IN JUUL: CONF. CALL.ALTRIA GROUP CEO SAYS ALSO BELIEVE THAT JUUL IS SET UP IN THE LONGER-TERM TO CONTINUE TO BE THE WINNER IN E-VAPOR.

4117500.headline: Altria Reports New 2020-2022 Adjusted Diluted EPS Growth Objective
4117500.description: Oct 31 (Reuters) - Altria Group Inc <MO.N>::ALTRIA REPORTS 2019 THIRD-QUARTER AND NINE-MONTHS RESULTS; ANNOUNCES NEW 2020 - 2022 ADJUSTED DILUTED EPS GROWTH OBJECTIVE TO ADVANCE STRATEGIC BUSINESS PLATFORM.

4218881.description: May 14 (Reuters) - Altria Group Inc <MO.N>::ALTRIA HOLDS 2020 ANNUAL MEETING OF SHAREHOLDERS; DECLARES REGULAR QUARTERLY DIVIDEND OF $0.84 PER COMMON SHARE.SETS REGULAR QUARTERLY DIVIDEND OF $0.84PER SHARE.
